start.title: George Deyneka
start.desc: Let's get to know each other! My name is George, and I Frontend developer. I want to introduce you to my personal portfolio.

results.title: I can deliver results that exceed your expectations.
results.subtitle: About Me
desc: I'm a software engineer with more than half of year of commercial experience in web development. My commercial experience is building complex SSR applications using the Nuxt.js (Vue) framework.
I have experience in creating adaptive applications using the Mobile/Desktop First technique, SPA development, working with the server and asynchronous code.
I work with modern frameworks and also have experience building applications written in vanilla JavaScript. I've also had success using Firebase Realtime Database and other databases.
It is worth mentioning the observance of such important development principles as DRY, KISS and SOLID. Of course, I work with the GIT version control system.

spec.title: My specialization is as follows:
spec.subtitle: Specializations
desc: Creating responsive websites using mobile first/desktop first technique
Development of SPA and SSR applications based on Angular/Vue/Nuxt
Working with deployment platforms (Netlify, Firebase, Cloudflare and others)
Assessing the complexity of tasks and taking responsibility for them

stack.title: Technologies that I use
stack.subtitle: Stack
desc: Here are the technologies with which I have worked and have some experience. You will see the main stack, frameworks, databases, libraries and more.
This means that I am ready to work on a project if it contains the following technologies, or create a project from scratch and implement these technologies.
